Cheap Hotels near Champs-Elysées, Paris

Lined with elegant cafés, boutiques, shops and cinemas, the Champs-Elysées is without a doubt the most iconic avenue in Paris. Although there are hardly any hotels in Paris, not to mention B&Bs, located on the Champs-Elysées itself, its length and location mean it’s easily reached wherever your stay. The avenue runs between two major Paris squares, Place Charles de Gaulle – where the Arc de Triomphe is found – and Place de la Concorde, home to the Luxor Obelisk.
If you’re in Paris for any major celebration, the chances are you’ll end up heading to the Champs-Elysées. This is particularly true for Christmas and New Year’s, when the avenue is beautifully lit up, and for the famous parade on Bastille Day. Our cheap accommodation in Paris in the centre of Paris means you can enjoy all the action on the Champs-Elysées at bargain prices.
